# init(attributedText:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a new label object with an attributed text string.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(attributedText: NSAttributedString?)
```

```swift
convenience init(attributedText: NSAttributedString?)
```

## Parameters

- **attributedText**: The attributed string from which to initialize the label.

## Return Value

A lable initialized from attributed text.

## Discussion

## Creating a Label

- **init(fontNamed:)**: Initializes a new label object with a specified font.
- **init(text:)**: Initializes a new label object with a text string.
